create_qualifiers_results_message.not_supported_yet: Qualifiers results message is not supported for multiple brackets tournament yet.

allow_next_reschedule.help: Allows a match to be reschedule without any time constraint applied
allow_next_reschedule.success:
The match `%1` is now allowed to be rescheduled without deadline checks once (if successful) during the next `%2` hours.

%3 / %4, you can now reschedule your match.
allow_next_reschedule.not_referee_of_match: You cannot allow the reschedule of a match of which you are not the referee.

take_match.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in all roles column (only for roles they have) for the corresponding matches.
take_match.not_taken_match_ids: As a __%1__, %2, those matches were **already taken**:
take_match.not_staff: You do not have any staff roles (Referee, Streamer...), so you cannot use this command.

take_match_as_referee.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Referee column for the corresponding matches.

take_match_as_streamer.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Streamer column for the corresponding matches.

take_match_as_commentator.help: Puts the staff member's name on the spreadsheet in the Commentator column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of all roles column (only for roles they have) for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_referee.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Referee column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_streamer.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Streamer column for the corresponding matches.

drop_match_as_commentator.help: Removes the staff member's name on the spreadsheet of the Commentator column for the corresponding matches.

qualifier_match_notification.common_end: This lobby will start in %4 minutes.
qualifier_match_notification.notification_no_referee: $./common_begin**No Referee** (%3, if you want to take this lobby, react with :muscle:)$./common_end

player_match_notification.common_end: This match will start in %5 minutes.
player_match_notification.notification_no_referee: $./common_begin**No Referee** (%4, if you want to take this match, react with :muscle:)$./common_end

referee_match_notification.description:
**%4, this match will start in \~6 hours and does not have any referee.**
If you want to take this match, please react with :muscle:
referee_match_notification.edited:
$./common

~~$./description~~

This match has been taken by %6.

reaction_on_staff_reschedule_message.staff_notification:
$./no_staff_notification

__Referee:__ %6
__Streamer:__ %7
__Commentator:__ %8

If you cannot referee/stream/commentate at the new time, please add a :x: reaction to this message.
reaction_on_staff_reschedule_message.no_staff_notification: The match %1 (%2 vs %3) has been rescheduled from %4 to %5.
reaction_on_staff_reschedule_message.staff_notification_all_staff_removed:
$./no_staff_notification

All the staffs that had taken this match dropped it.

show_next_matches.help: Shows a list of next matches (by default 5 next matches)
show_next_matches.no_match_without_referee: There is no more matches without a referee.
